body: I don't see how this handles `view(1)`. In that case the containing if-statement `nargs > max_pos_args` won't be true because both `nargs` and `max_pos_args` will be 1.
body_html: I don't see how this handles view(1). In that case the containing if-statement nargs > max_pos_args won't be true because both nargs and max_pos_args will be 1.
